game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-lost city deep in the heart of the mystical forest. The city is said to contain an ancient artifact with immense magical power. Brave adventurers are needed to retrieve this artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 10,000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting +20% intelligence

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the mystical forest
task.description: Make your way through the village and head east towards the mystical forest. Be cautious of wild beasts and hostile creatures.

task.objective: Navigate through the mystical forest to reach the ruins of Eldarath
task.description: The journey will be treacherous, but with persistence and courage, you shall reach the ancient city. Keep an eye out for ancient traps and puzzles.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the central chamber
task.description: Face the guardian of the city and claim the artifact as your reward. The power of the ancient ones shall be yours to wield.
